snippet: Despite homering off Roy Halladay and going 3-for-3 on the day, Alex Rodriguez warned that it’s too soon to draw conclusions.
abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez flashes some power in spring training, but notes that it is only March and too soon to draw conclusions.
lead_paragraph: Despite homering off Roy Halladay and going 3-for-3 on the day, Alex Rodriguez warned that it’s too soon to draw conclusions.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Rodriguez Flashes Power, but Notes That It’s March, Not October
headline.main: Rodriguez Flashes Some Power, but Notes That It’s March, Not October
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Flashes Some Power, but Notes That It’s March, Not October
